english: She developed a few harmless eccentricities .
chinese: 她逐渐养成一些无害的癖性。

english: I believe this is a common habit of children and adolescents .
chinese: 我认为这是儿童和少年的共同癖性。

english: All this tended to draw him back into his old habits of mind .
chinese: 所有这些都导致他去重新恢复旧癖性。

english: The accursed shark alone can in any generic respect be said to bear comparative analogy to the dog .
chinese: 就一般情况说来，只有那种可恶的鲨鱼，才可以说是具有跟狗相似的癖性。

english: If one becomes actively interested in money, he should know something of its nature and character and tendencies .
chinese: 要是一个人对钱发生了极大的兴趣，他就应当多少了解一些它的本性、特点和癖性。
癖性造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: His non-appearance afforded shelton another proof of the delicacy that went hand in hand with the young vagrant's cynicism .
chinese: 他不来，对谢尔顿又一次证明了他是通达人情的，这种通达人情是跟那位年轻流浪汉的讥诮癖性并行不悖的。

english: Know his every . every mannerism , uh , facial tic , gesture
chinese: 我了解他的每一种癖性

english: One of his idiosyncrasies is keeping pet snakes
chinese: 他的癖性之一是养蛇玩赏。

english: Environment conditions a child to behave in certain ways
chinese: 环境于小孩习惯地表现出某些癖性。

english: Andy bull gets to grips with power cables , security guards , nail - biting finishes - and couchette companions
chinese: 安迪公牛与力量电报扭打起来，安全警卫，咬指甲癖性完成-并且火车卧辅同伴。

english: Our carnivorous proclivities go back a long way ? and our ability to cope with the drawbacks of meat eating ( elevated cholesterol , parasites and infections ) may derive from certain genes
chinese: 但还先别急著收起切肉刀，因为我们人类嗜肉的癖性可上溯至远古，我们对食肉害处（胆固醇升高、寄生虫和感染的增加）的抵抗力，也可能来自特定的基因。

english: What i learned , in writing the words of a hymn , was that such a composition ( as opposed to a poem ) must not be an expression of one ' s own beliefs , doubts and peculiarities ; it must be a completely orthodox statement which a whole congregation can heartily agree to make
chinese: 我从写赞美诗歌词中学到的是这类写作（跟写诗相反）表达的不应是个人的信念、疑念和癖性；应该是整个群体都同意这么写的完全正统的内容。

english: Section iii deals with the cause of drug criminality , it probes drug criminality form a historical as well as realistic point of view , on the basis of which a conclusion is wade that it is the drive for economic and the drug addiction - prone which make drug criminality so prevalent
chinese: 第三部分题为，透视毒品犯罪的成因。首先从历史的角度探求毒品犯罪的成因，接着从现实的角度探求毒品犯罪的成因，从而得出毒品犯罪成因? ?经济利益的驱动性和毒品易形成的瘾癖性。

english: My favorite time is at night , tokyo is sleeping . i am a peeper . i can peep every part of it . at nine in the night , there is nobody on the road . a cat go pass me and look at me for 3 mins , then it go away quietly . cats in this city live very scrupulously too . it is clean everywhere . new things and old things all keep their own way proudly . i like the quiet and delicacy , but soon i begin to antagonize this city because i am chinese poor , i cant hand this delicay all the time . i wanna leave . from the second day i arrived there , it still close in me
chinese: 我最喜欢夜晚的东京,当他睡着了,我这个偷窥者可以肆意挖掘他的隐秘之处.晚上九点,街上已没了行人.路上经过的猫停下和我对视, 3秒之后又安静的离开.这个城市的猫生活的似乎也比较小翼.每个角落都很干净,鞋子走了一天也没什么灰尘.新的东西和旧的东西都昂首挺胸默默地保持着自己的姿态.我喜欢这种安静和精致,但时间一长我这中国草根的癖性便渐渐让我和这座精致开始对抗.我开始想要离开,当我到达的第二天,这种想法就在每天纠结着我,以致让我像完成任务一样完成我每天的行程,情绪一直没法高涨
